fr.lri.swingstates.canvas

Class CExtensionalTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Tag
      • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CTag
        • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CExtensionalTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CElement, java.util.Iterator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CNamedTag, ColorTag

    public abstract class CExtensionalTag
extends CTag

    A CExtensionalTag tag is a tag that can be explicitely attached to and detached from a shape, i.e. a shape can be added to or removed to the tag's collection.

    Author:
    Caroline Appert
    See Also:
    CTag

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CExtensionalTag()
      Builds a CExtensionalTag that can tag shapes.
      CExtensionalTag(Canvas c)
      Builds a CExtensionalTag that can tag the shapes displayed on the canvas c.

      Method called when this tag is removed from an CShape.
      CExtensionalTag removeFrom(CShape s)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CExtensionalTag

        public CExtensionalTag()
        Builds a CExtensionalTag that can tag shapes.

      • CExtensionalTag

        public CExtensionalTag(Canvas c)
        Builds a CExtensionalTag that can tag the shapes displayed on the canvas c. This tag can be explicitely removed to any shape displayed on c.
        Parameters:
        c - The canvas

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        Inits the tag's iterator.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Tag

      • added

        public void added(CShape s)
        Method called when this tag is added to an CShape. By default, this method does nothing. Redefine it in a subclass to specify side effects, such as changing the color of the attached CShape.
        Parameters:
        s - The CShape

      • removed

        public void removed(CShape s)
        Method called when this tag is removed from an CShape. By default, this method does nothing. Redefine it in a subclass to specify side effects, such as changing the color of the attached CShape.
        Parameters:
        s - The CShape

      • addTo

        public final CExtensionalTag addTo(CShape s)
        Adds the shape s to the collection containing all the shapes that have this tag. This method calls begin(CShape), which can be redefined in subclasses to specify side effects, such as changing the color of the attached object when the tag is added.
        Parameters:
        s - The CShape
        Returns:
        this tag
        See Also:
        added(CShape)

      • removeFrom

        public final CExtensionalTag removeFrom(CShape s)
        Removes the shape s from the collection containing all the shapes that have this tag. This method calls end(CShape), which can be redefined in subclasses to specify side effects, such as changing the color of the attached object when the tag is removed.
        Parameters:
        s - The CShape
        Returns:
        this tag
        See Also:
        removed(CShape)
